titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow Federal employees who are separated from Federal service to make penalty-free distributions from Thrift Savings Plans and include such distributions in gross income over 3 years.

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow Federal employees who are separated from Federal service to make penalty-free distributions from Thrift Savings Plans and include such distributions in gross income over 3 years.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
